name: E & S Consultancy
tag_list: uk-immigration, permanent-residence, british-citizenship, work-permit, uk-visa, uk-work-visa, naturalization, british-nationality, tier-2-general, tier-2-work-permit, highly-skilled-visa, tier-1-general, family-visas, premium-service, hsmp-extension
overview:
E&S Consultancy specialises in all aspects of UK Immigration Law (apart from asylum) such as Tier 1 (General - Highly Skilled Migrant), Tier 2 (General), Tier 2 (Intra Company Transfer), work permit, Certificate of Sponsorship, indefinite leave to remain, British citizenship, etc.

E&S Consultancy can also fast track some types of immigration applications (Tier 1 General, Tier 2 General, indefinite leave to remain etc) using UK Border Agency’s premium services.

For corporate clients, E&S Consultancy can advise in obtaining a Sponsor License for Tier 2 (General), Tier 2 (ICT) and Tier 5 applications and conduct immigration audit for corporate clients in order to meet UK Border Agency’s requirements. E&S Consultancy is regulated by the Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner (OISC) and take all applications â€œon a no win, no fee basisâ€ at very competitive prices.
